entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
